description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with pieces of sandwich cookies.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk
Lavender flower water, local wildflower honey. This flavor will make you feel like you’re drifting through a field in Provence…or maybe that’s just us.
White chocolate ice cream with lots of toasted salted pistachio pieces mixed in.
Local milk from Simply Natural Creamery, mixed with heavy cream. Ice cream in its simplest form. Perfect with hot fudge!
Callebaut milk chocolate ice cream with lavender flower water.
Our vegan coffee ice cream (made with Bean Traders espresso!) with Bushmills Irish whiskey.
Our coconut-milk-based ice cream alternative, made with Amarena cherries, cherry liqueur, and chocolate flakes.
